items.title: Introducing Kling Motion Handler in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update adds a new Kling Motion Handler to the Platform Service, featuring 341 lines of new code. The handler processes motion requests, enhancing the functionality of video processing. Additionally, the server file has been updated to integrate this new handler, ensuring seamless operation.

items.title: Enhance lyric generation functionality in Platform Service ðŸŽ¶
items.summary: This update modifies the lyric generation method to streamline its return values based on the model type. The function now returns a single result for the 'default' model while maintaining the previous behavior for other models. These changes improve the clarity and usability of the lyric generation feature.
